A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Great characters reduced to plot points and no character development for the main characters has left me not caring what happens in Episode 9. For the first 2 minutes I thought I was watching the Spaceballs sequel. Silly space Mary Poppins scene. Slow space chase with fuel issues? The great Luke Skywalker reduced to a reclused coward. The franchise has been ruined.
